website_summaries.verdict: Great sound, comfortable, and completely cordless. Take these earbuds wherever you go with portable charging case.
pros: Approximately 3 hours playback time and four hours talk time from a single charge
Portable charging case is capable of three sets of charges offering three hours per charge
These ear buds offer exceptional value for money
cons: Some buyers found the buds difficult to sync

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome I accidentally washed my first pair in the washing machine so this is my second pair and I will buy again if I break these ones super comfortable to use and no cords. Update I washed my second pair! Jeez I'm an idiot. So I'm done buying these but I still love and would recommend to people. They are easy to forget in your pockets or cargo pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Meat Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Into the junk drawer with my Iomega Zip drive. Bluetooth plugs do not connect together.
customer_reviews.text: The right unit pairs. Or. the left one pairs.... Followed the instructions. Selected the T Bluetooth option, left one drops off Bluetooth connection. I don’t want to do this every time I get ready to go somewhere. Both Bluetooth plugs do not work together. Simple as that. There are a lot of fake reviews on this product. Should have returned them earlier, but I kept trying. Buyer beware. Sorry Seller. QA is lacking. Case and fit and finish is excellent. Circuits are crap. Bluetooth should be able to connect when the devices are within mm of each other. Wish I could have used them. Into the junk drawer with my Iomega Zip drive.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Huston

customer_reviews.title: Good if you want to listen in one earbud
customer_reviews.text: I think they work but it’s really hard to get them to actually play together. They just go one at a time and when you “pair” them it just disconnects. Good if you want to listen in one earbud!
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: The true WIRELESS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for my workout to replace the "SENSO Bluetooth Headphones" I bought few days before. Yes. That's right. I bought two earphones in 5 days span. I bought this one in frustration and the SENSO bluetooth headphones kept falling off my ears while I'm exercising. I have NO problem with this one. It was comfortable enough to wear for a long time. Sound quality was spot on. I have no issues pairing it with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: CEOrigin

customer_reviews.title: Bad All Around
customer_reviews.text: These were bad from the get-go and after about 8 months they just completely stopped working. They were never comfortable in my ears, the volume didn't get very loud and it took forever to pair the earbuds together and with the phone. One would pair, then the other would pair and then they would both disconnect then, if I was lucky I'd get one to pair again and eventually they both MIGHT pair. Do yourself a favor, order literally any other pair of earbuds than these!
customer_reviews.author: JSmash

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, overall pretty happy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually pretty critical of most things, which is why these got 4 stars. (Compared to my Sony wh-1000xm3 which would get 5 across the board, but they’re 6x the price). These are very good for the money. I usually buy skull candy for inexpensive, but decent quality. These have outperformed my current skull candy wireless earbuds, and those are not true-wireless, they have a wire connecting the two. These are good sound quality, last a while on a charge, decent bass and clarity. Had them since March of 18, (it’s july 2019 as of this writing). Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Okay while they work
customer_reviews.text: These worked pretty well for how cheap they are. The sound was good and the Bluetooth connection was okay. I had a lot of stuttering in the right earbud. This is because your phone connects only to the left earbud and then the left earbud daisy chains to the right earbud. Because of this I mostly used them one earbud at a time which worked for a while until the right earbud stopped working completely. Overall I would not recommend these if you're looking for a PAIR of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: WHawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work for about 90 minuted at a time during a 10 hr day. I turn them off and put them in the case to charge during my breaks. Once in a while they don't last very long before I get a low battery warning. I like them enough to put up with spotty charging issue. I've had a few times one would fall out and hit the floor and once had one fall into a bucket of oil-based slime. Wiped clean and no problems. Dropped the case a week ago and the latch spring is loose and sometimes dosn't catch the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Ad5k

customer_reviews.title: Battery life isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who works out a lot. He said they were the best headphones yet (he goes through a lot of them) in terms of staying in his ears when he is on the treadmill. The problem is that the battery in one of them isn't working well anymore. It is only lasting about a half hour now before it totally dies. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great...at first.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a year and a half, I got them to use on my long runs so I only use them maybe 1-2 times a week. At this point the right earbud loses a charge after about 40 minutes and the left earbud has started to not hold a charge for long either. I'll go for an hour and half run and end up with only one ear bud working mid-way through. Very disappointing since they fit pretty well and the sound is ok. I hadn't really had any issues with connectivity, just battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regruts
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like these buds. They work very well as handsfree phone. I use them everyday for music. It seems to me the right ear bud doesn't perform as well as the left, but maybe I'm losing hearing in that ear. IDK. Totally minor and not a deterrent\distraction. Fit easily in my ear, comes with different sizes for rubber ear piece. My favorite feature is the case. Automatically hangs up buds. The case charges with a fairly common charger cable... Same as Samsung. Small and compact. No regrets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irish echo

customer_reviews.title: Do not but these. I have had them for ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not but these. I have had them for less than four months and the left one says battery low after leaving it charging for two days. Update: After talking to Amazon about this they have given me a full refund. The first time I have had an issue and they made it right the same day I contacted them. Nice work Amazon I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Cannot stay connected to phone, hard pass.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner to use when she is running. I expected that they wouldn't sound the best but was ok with that. What I found is that the right ear bud never seems to stay connected for more than a couple minutes. Once they are fully charged they seem to stay connected longer but soon after playing a song or two the right ear bud cuts out ever minute or so. It's very annoying and I am searching for a new pair to replace these ones. Overall I would not recommend anyone buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch McCracken

customer_reviews.text: I've had these for almost 2 years now and they still work. I keep them and use them at work. I like that they do cancel out harsh noises within reason. I work in a shop with all kinds of loud noises all the time. 1 star reduction for the base not keeping a charge. I have to have them plugged in. But for my use it's not a huge deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dirtè

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the gym to replace my wireless headphones. I thought I loved my wireless headphones and couldn't be happier, but these work out really well. I have small ears and most things that fit in side the ear hurt after a while, but these are pretty comfortable. Happy with my purchase. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: YvieB

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. The right ear bud is defective. Left is a champ and my other pair I purchased in June. They’re still running strong. I don’t know why people are complaining about the volume. I’m using mine in a factory. No complaints on my previous pair. I’m only leaving this as a one star because of my damaged ear bud. Please just send me a new set so I don’t have to print off a dam return label.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Charge doesn’t last even 4 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! The idea is great, but unfortunately the execution isn’t there. I bought this to use at work so I could be free of cords and walk. The charge doesn’t even last until noon. It looses connection a lot. There are better choices, I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wollard

customer_reviews.title: decent although spotty - until they stopped working altogether.
customer_reviews.text: Pluses: The sound quality was fine, the earbuds stayed in my ears Minuses: Batteries reliably ran out after slightly less then 2 hours (I started taking a pair of wired earbuds on longer runs), sound dropped off and restarted randomly (I am guessing due to excessive sensitivity to bluetooth interference from devices used by passers-by), and finally the right ear bud just plain stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: JEAN D

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how well these earbuds perform the sounds are so clear and the bass tones are crisp no muffling or dampening. They hold a charge for 4 hrs. of continuous play. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Question if You Lose an Earbud
customer_reviews.text: So these were easy to use. Keep the box charged - which is great to keep track of these buds. Easy pairing, etc. However, around this time last year I dropped one on the subway platform and it bounced onto the subway track. I looked at it sadly. While I could have gotten it back, could anything ever really sanitize the New York subway off of it so that it could go into my ear? Anyway, I still have the one and the box - is there a way I can get the other bud and only that?
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Junk Junk Junk
customer_reviews.text: these things are junk only plays music out of one ear ant the one that will work the music cuts out for a few seconds then comes back on.Save your money DO NOT buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Streetglide

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds work well and have good quality sound. Battery life is about 3 hours. They fit my ear well and have never dropped out whether I'm at the gym or doing yard work. Had one bud go silent after about 6 months. Contacted the company, got immediate replies, and after a couple different suggested work-arounds failed, they sent me a new set! Everything resolved with new set in hand in about a week. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Truman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Started out okay, but fell off quickly. I frequently had sync issues, as the buds would unpair from each other out of nowhere (even mid-run). Then, one bud just died. It won't charge, won't turn on, nothing. I run a lot, and just chalked it up to sweat damage and buying cheap buds. Maybe if I hadn't abused them with my sweat, they'd have lasted longer!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Worcester

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: These work great for the price. While the sound quality may not be liked by most audiophiles they do give a great sound. Tricky to sync but once done you have around 4 hours of play time mic is also decent
customer_reviews.author: My name

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: One earbud completely stopped holding a charge. Kind of a hassle to pair these as well, nowhere near as simple as using my Galaxy Buds.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D'Auria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed I was hoping for better fit and better noise blocking . Left earphone keeps disconnecting, I will have to eat them as window to return is over
customer_reviews.author: Trino Villalonga

customer_reviews.title: Master reads battery low and shuts off at 20%
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Worth the money. Battery life is about 2 hours. I've had them for about a year. According to the battery life displayed on my phone they shut downat about 20% which seems high to me. The master ear bud runs low first and you can reconnect with the slave and get sound through that one alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and easy to use battery life is short ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and easy to use battery life is short like 4hrs but you can carry the charging case to juice em up again. I like them very much!
customer_reviews.author: Cruise Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality of this earbuds are great. It's easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of this earbuds are great. It's easy to connect. One charge can be used for several day. Excellent quality and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Connielin

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for in this case. Uncomfortable in my ear after about thirty minutes and the battery doesn’t last very long. Maybe an hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: George Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Nice earbuds. Compared to some of the expensive buds out there, (including Apple's) these are a great value. Only complaint is they sometimes fall out of my ears, especially if eating.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Decent.  Give them a go.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for the gym on the days I lift weights. (Wires get in the way and I can't afford any AirPods.) So far they have performed very well. Sometimes one of the headphones disconnects and I have to repair them, which can be a pain, but it's rare. Otherwise, the sound is amazing, they fit well (even when I'm sweating), and they last throughout a full workout. I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AfroBurrito

customer_reviews.title: Broken and only ok to begin with
customer_reviews.text: These never were very good to begin with (talking on the phone with them is pointless the other person will NOT be able to hear you) and sound quality and battery life were only OK - for the price I dealt with it but I've had them less than a year and they've given out. Not worth it even at the price, pay up for better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Darbin

customer_reviews.title: love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality, I use them everyday while on the treadmill, but they need to be charged each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: These are great earbuds. My teenage son wears them all the time. They are heavily used, and well loved. Going on month 5 with no issues. Great sound! My son liked them so much, he convinced his dad to get a pair. My husband wears them at the gym and loves that there are no wires to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: ORblonde

customer_reviews.title: I love the ways these sounds
customer_reviews.text: I love the ways these sounds, but after wearing them for only an hour they hurt my ears. I am going to have to return them. Bummer sounds quality sounds so much better than these other $50 headphones I​ purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: They don't pair with each other anymore.
customer_reviews.text: They don't pair with each other anymore. They were working fine for a few months with good sound quality. But suddenly they stopped pairing with each other. I contacted the company and they never replied back to me. I threw them away. Battery life is not good.
customer_reviews.author: ROSS

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: It's really cool. love the design. And the sound effect is very good as well. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sync problems and the sound is choppy and crappy ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sync problems and the sound is choppy and crappy no bass whatsoever if i knew this wireless Bluetooth earphones would be this I would never had buy them iPhone X. Package was really well made and pack but that’s probably the only good thing about this earphones.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my first set. Perfect to use to workout in. Not always easy to connect has you have to do each ear separately
customer_reviews.author: Queenkai

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for the first few months. Than it stopped charging
customer_reviews.author: Jakepgh

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: They worked great while they worked. Didn't make it quite a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A. Van Loon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing earbuds, this is just what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing earbuds, this is just what I was looking for- exact fit, these are so light and great quality sound, good amount of bass, which is a plus for wireless earbuds, build in battery life is not bad and there is a charging case which is very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Pairing after 3 Weeks of Use
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the horrible sound quality, I thought these headphones were decent for the price. After about 2-3 weeks of use, the headphones stopped paring to each other. So I can only listen with one ear playing. You get what you pay for I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Connor Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Its exhausting to waste so much time pairing it-disconnests super easily
customer_reviews.text: I cannog give this product more than one star. I trully gave it a chance. Its exhausting to waste so much time pairing it-disconnests super easily. Now the battery cant hold for more than 30 minutes. All i hear is "battery low"
customer_reviews.author: OneWorld

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality on my end
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good sound quality on my end, comfortable / fit well, charging case enclosed earbuds. Cons: the person on the other end of the phone could not hear me consistently, only one of the earbuds could truly be used independently without turning on both.
customer_reviews.author: katie bennett

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love it while it lasted, but broke within a year
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection to blue tooth, lots of white noise.
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted a long time. They did not want to stick in my ears. The sound had white noise almost constantly when my phone was 3 get away.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A great headset. Maybe my ears are a bit small ...
customer_reviews.text: A great headset. Maybe my ears are a bit small because there is no confidence in the mini, but this is the only place I am not satisfied with. I've been using it until now. It is very easy to carry because when you do not need to use it can be placed in the box automatically charge.
customer_reviews.author: fang

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again or recommend this to anyone looking for a wireless ear piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Took alittle to pair it but once it was it has worked flawlessly so far. I would buy this again or recommend this to anyone looking for a wireless ear piece set. 2 thumbs up👍👍
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use with my phone. Sound great and they do not fall out of your ear.
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN EDWARDS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: These headphones seem cool but they are not loud and they do not charge well in the case. After using them at the gym for 2 weeks they stopped charging all together. Spend a few extra bucks and get a different pair
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The earbuds are great. The battery last a really long time before ...
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are great. The battery last a really long time before charging when using them to watch movies and the battery last about 2 hrs when listening to music non stop. The battery also doesn’t take long to charge fully.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crawford

customer_reviews.title: I gave this item 2 stars even though I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 2 stars even though I returned it , pro about it is the convenient case that charges it and keep them secure . The con was it’s not loud enough compared to ones I’ve purchased before. It also seem to static a lot when paired together.
customer_reviews.author: dominique wilson

customer_reviews.title: Case only charges one
customer_reviews.text: Only one side of the case fully charged the ear bud. They sync and then almost immediately lose the connection.
customer_reviews.author: R. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds durable . I had them for 2 years still work great ! Just a little big but not bad
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: great buds for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use with my iphone...great buds for the price...Love the wireless aspect of it so that no cords get in the way!!! Great sound and bass.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: There is better out there they can not hear you when you speak does not work for ps4 wich they said it would and falls out you're ear
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: I actually have both in right now and they sound great. They are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in today, it took me about 5 minutes to connect them to my phone. I actually have both in right now and they sound great. They are comfortable, light, and very simple. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jess A.

customer_reviews.title: These headphones work great! They are comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work great! They are comfortable to wear, and they connect easily with my iPhone. For this price I cound't be more happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kin Chen

customer_reviews.title: no good tin can garbage
customer_reviews.text: early interrupted by other frequencies, horrible tin can hard to hear type sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dskillz

customer_reviews.title: --so so
customer_reviews.text: So so. Fits OK and sound is OK. Latency is not good, so watching a movie with these is out of the question...
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: HOT charging cord!
customer_reviews.text: I've only briefly used these to make sure the sound works fine, but there is a major issue with my charging cord. I smelled something hot coming from my computer, and it was the charging cord. I could barely unplug it it was so hot! Be careful and maybe be prepared to buy a new micro USB to regular USB cord if you have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Great product but no response from the company with issue.
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have purchased them twice. Unfortunately I lost the first pair and purchased a new pair a few months ago. The new pair, one earbud is not working and no one from the company has responded to my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brent Fisher

customer_reviews.title: For price great. lack in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. easy to work and connect. looked at reviews for foreverrrrr before buying. i’ve had powerbeats and my only complaint is the sound quality is not good in comparison but they were 30 so all good
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend, def cheap
customer_reviews.text: They were ok. Often had problems where only one earphone would be paired to my phone and the other would lose Bluetooth connection. Battery life wasn’t that great either and ultimately died within 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Shiho

customer_reviews.title: Bass is Weak
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality. Bass is very weak. Save your money. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out all the time.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps losing signal if you move (even when walking). Specially the right one. Please don't but it. It's a pity, because sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dario Juarez

customer_reviews.title: This broke 2 months after purchase (one of the ear ...
customer_reviews.text: This broke 2 months after purchase (one of the ear buds will not turn on), after the return window closed. Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN P SON

customer_reviews.title: ... I only 1workin so far but overall shipment was awesome no damage of any production I have bought off ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of theme I only 1workin so far but overall shipment was awesome no damage of any production I have bought off Amazon everything have been awesome
customer_reviews.author: Ms ARIES

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound and super convenience at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very practical in a self-contained charging box. Quality sound and super convenience at a reasonable price. Also, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Thibaud W

customer_reviews.title: he say he love them. easy use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my friend .he say he love them.easy use ,sound quality is good.he use them one by one,so never no power.just remenber put it back after you finish using
customer_reviews.author: Guo Qin Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy
customer_reviews.text: Short battery life after the first few uses. One didn’t work most of the time so it was single ear listening and they always fell out my ear.
customer_reviews.author: earl lee cox, sr.

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds won't sync together.
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds would not sync together. They would both pair to my phone individually but not together. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bluetooth device to connect with my android and it is working fine as of now. Decent battery back up and sound clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Regz

customer_reviews.title: The charging box is poor quality. Within the first two days it wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The charging box is poor quality. Within the first two days it wouldn't charge the earbuds without being plugged in. After two weeks the box won't charge at all. Now both earbuds are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: my box doesn't charge me ear bubs light never changes color
customer_reviews.author: Gustava Fiske

customer_reviews.title: Died in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in october of 2018. It is now april of 2019 and the left one is already broken. It cannot hold a charge to save its life. They were otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth alex

customer_reviews.title: One side stopped working
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t last long before one side stopped working. The right still works but the left does not. Disappointing. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remember to double click once power on.
customer_reviews.text: Once on you, you need to double click to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Kuga

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves them. Easy to set up and pair and working well.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product😀
customer_reviews.text: Great for exercising, just need to have the right size ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Had them for a while but only started using them more recently. Really enjoyed them until they randomly stopped charging. Such a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit well in my ears! Very comfortable! Excellent sound with iPhone. The connection is quite stable.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, Set up was so easy, Sound is very good,
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with battery life and sound quality but they talk a bit longer to pair then other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Harry23

customer_reviews.title: Battery not long for this world
customer_reviews.text: From new battery life was short (about 2/2-1/2 hours) and continued to dwindle until the left ear works for only 10 minutes. Got these 3 months ago. I give them a- 👎annoying rating
customer_reviews.author: d smallbread

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds stopped holding a charge not long after the final date to return. garbage,dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the ear buds to synchronize. Also too big for my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Earl W. Sethre

customer_reviews.title: They stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Was real satisfied with product when I received it the after a month they just stopped working!! They will not charge! I have tried different wall recepticals in my house and tried charging in with my car charger!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Needs better charging station
customer_reviews.text: The left ear bud doesn't charge as strongly as the right therefore the battery life is 2hrs max which doesn't make thought a workout session
customer_reviews.author: Williams904

customer_reviews.title: Decent but......
customer_reviews.text: Decent and inexpensive. Problem I have is I have owned these earbuds for 7 months and the right ear bud doesnt hold a charge anymore.

customer_reviews.title: they're pretty awesome lol earbuds and the battery life on them ...

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not great..
customer_reviews.text: Loved them at first but at the gym the music just isn’t loud enough on the highest setting... if you like loud music this are not the product for you!

product_meta.title: Soundmoov 316T Mini Wireless Earbuds with Charging Box - Black
product_meta.description:
When we say "True wireless", we mean it. This Mini Invisible Stereo Earphones is the world's smallest, wireless, and convenient wireless earbuds. Bluetooth technology enables you to connect the earbuds to any smart device and offers a more considerable and comfortable using experience with no strings, cool design concept for fitness. You don’t have to plug your phone in to listen to music or deal with annoying cords. The tiny earbuds has a built-in mic (For safety, Built-in mic feature is only on the right headset), so you can easily take calls.

How to pair
1.Short press the button on both earbuds at the same time .You will hear ‘Power on’ and then saying ‘Your device is connected’.
2.Find ’HV-316T’ on your phone or tablet wireless list. Click it and you will hear ‘Your device is connected’. Now your device is connected successfully. You can play music or make a phone call.
3.If aksed a passcode, enter 0000 and the earphones will then connect to your devices.
4.The next time you turn on the earbuds, they will automatically search for and attempt to connect to the last paired device.


Technical Parameters
Bluetooth : 4.1
HD Voice Support
Auto-Reconnect
Charging Time: about 2 hours
Talking time: 2-4 hours
Music time:3hours(80% volume)
Bluetooth range: 15m
Package include
2 x HV316T Truly Wireless Earbuds
1 x Micro USB Charging Cable
1 x Charging Case
4 xExtra Earbuds
1 x User Manual


Get the SoundMoov Edge:
12 Month worry-free warranty
24 Hour dedicated email support
100% customer satisfaction

Premium quality, cutting edge technology at affordable prices
feature_bullets: REAL WIRELESS SEPARATE STEREO: Soundmoov 316T adpot TWS technology to make wireless stereo synchronous connection pairing come true. Without any cord troubles you can enjoy sports and music to the full.

STORAGE BOX WITH CHARGING FUNCTION: Equipped with mini and portable 450 mAh battery charging box, which can support 3 times fully charging for the wireless earbuds. You can enjoy up to 3 hours continuous music time after fully charged.

MULTI-FUNCTIONS CONNECTIVITY: Twins mode: use 2 earbuds simultaneously, you can share the same music with someone; Single mode: choose the right one or the left one, each bluetooth headset can connect with two Bluetooth devices like your iPhone or iPad.

COMFORTABLE AND SECURE FIT: Soundmoov 316T is designed base on thousands people's ear data, perfect angle and 3 sizes of ear cap, suit for most peoples’ ear, enjoy most comfortable, fitting, stable wear experience.

WILD COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with iPhone 7 6S 6 plus, LG G5 G4 G3, ipod shuffle, ipod nano 7, Samsung Galaxy S7 S6, BlackBerry, HTC, iPad Pro, Bluetooth-enabled tablets;Perfect for Sports,Running,Jogging & Gym Exercise,Watching TV,or Sleep.
